@graph.caption: vegan mexican street corn in a cup with mayo , almond crema, and queso

@graph.name: Esquites: Vegan Mexican Street Corn « Dora's Table
@graph.description: Esquites (vegan Mexican street corn) this popular Mexican snack gone vegan is just as delicious as the original, but dairy-free!

@graph.name: Dora S.
@graph.description: Dora is the founder, recipe developer, and photographer at Dora's Table and Mi Mero Mole. Born and raised in Mexico and a graduate of the Culinary Institute of America in New York, she adopted a vegan (plant-based) diet to take control of her health.

@graph.name: Vegan Mexican Street Corn (Esquites)
@graph.description: Esquites (vegan Mexican street corn) this popular Mexican snack gone vegan is just as delicious as the original, but dairy-free!
recipeIngredient: ½ cup Vegan queso fresco or ( vegan queso cotija)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large sauté pan to medium heat. Add butter, as soon as butter begins to melt add onion. Let cook for 3-4 minutes or until onion is tender and translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a large sauté pan to medium heat. Add butter, as soon as butter begins to melt add onion. Let cook for 3-4 minutes or until onion is tender and translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic, stir, and continue to cook 2 more minutes or until you begin to smell the garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic, stir, and continue to cook 2 more minutes or until you begin to smell the garlic.

recipeInstructions.text: Add corn, epazote, and chile de arbol. Stir to combine. Add vegetable broth, enough to barely cover the corn, and lower heat to a simmer. Simmer for about 8 min. or until the corn is tender. Season to taste with salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Add corn, epazote, and chile de arbol. Stir to combine. Add vegetable broth, enough to barely cover the corn, and lower heat to a simmer. Simmer for about 8 min. or until the corn is tender. Season to taste with salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain some of the corn with a slotted spoon, and place it into cups. Add a squeeze of lime juice, 1 tbsp. vegan mayo, 1 tbsp. almond crema, 1 tbsp. Vegan queso fresco to each cup. Sprinkle some chile powder on top, and some more lime juice if needed. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain some of the corn with a slotted spoon, and place it into cups. Add a squeeze of lime juice, 1 tbsp. vegan mayo, 1 tbsp. almond crema, 1 tbsp. Vegan queso fresco to each cup. Sprinkle some chile powder on top, and some more lime juice if needed. Serve immediately.

@graph.keywords: dairy-free, esquites, street food, vegan esquites, vegan mexican, vegan mexican street corn
